title: Application Management
description: The information in this chapter was relocated from Appendix C in the preceding (2.3.1) revision of the standard. It had previously been entitled Network Management, and has been renamed to more accurately describe the purpose of the messages described herein.  This chapter does not specify a protocol for managing networks, Ã  la TCP/IP SNMP.  Rather, its messages provide a means to manage HL7-supporting applications over a network.
